title: I Want a Husband - Novel Updates
tags: Ancient Times   Arranged Marriage   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Marriage   Military   Older Love Interests   R-18   Wars
author: Lee Jian   이지안
description:
General Cheongwoon , who returned home after 10 days of battle, got married to a little skinny girl. 

“All I need is Husband!”

A 12-year-old young bride who is bold and ferocious.

Years have passed since then, and in front of Cheongwoon, back from another long war, stood the little girl who in the meantime has become a well-known beauty in the city!

“Damn it. Why are you so pretty?”>
